title: Tag&Rename v3.6.5 Final
description:
Tag&Rename v3.6.5 Final Installer - 2010kaiser
                  ==============================================


                 N.B.: THIS INSTALLER MUST BE RAN AS ADMINISTRATOR
                 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



Tag & Rename - this file tag editor music formats, which supports all popular digital audio formats.
It does not matter what codec / audio format you prefer, with Tag & Rename you can easily keep your music collection in a structured, organized way.
Tag & Rename - tag editor and organizer for media files, having a full built-in support for the following formats (types and versions of tags):
1. mp3 (ID3v1, ID3v2.2, ID3v2.3 and ID3v2.4 tags),
2. MusePack mpc / mp + (APEv1, APEv2 and ID3v1 tags),
3. Windows Media wma, asf and wmv files,
4. Ogg Vorbis / Flac / Speex (vorbis comments),
5. Apple iTunes and iPod aac (m4a) files including mp4, lossless m4a and protected m4p files,
6. also supports the most popular lossless-codecs including Monkey `s Audio, Flac, Wav Pack, Optim Frog, True Audio, Apple, Windows Media lossless, Wav and Aiff.
Tag & Rename includes full support for Unicode.
Tag & Rename also includes support for editing a large number of additional fields of tags, including: lyrics, cover art, rating, mood, disc #, part of a compilation, album artist, classical music fields (Composer, Conductor, etc.), File related URL `s etc.

With Tag & Rename you will be available:
=======================================
- Direct and batch editing id3 tags
- Automatic correction and addition of incomplete files tags, using the on-line-base freedb
- Automatically download the song titles and cover art from amazon.com servers
- Automatically download album / compilations from servers tracktype.org
- Obtain data to fill the tags, using an analysis of names mp3-files and folders structure containing
- Batch rename mp3-files and folders in accordance with the information tags
- Create play-sheets of different formats
- Exporting tag information in the file formats CSV, HTML, XML, text, and much more ...
Tag & Rename supports many music file formats and standards for tags and makes them simple and intuitive, so that you can work with the metadata of music files, without thinking about what codec / versions and version tag used in encoding / editing metadata of a particular file, - Tag & Rename easily handle any of them.
Tag & Rename - the software from the category of "must have" for any player owner / collection mp3/mp4 files and other supported formats.
Tag & Rename fully supports Windows Vista, 7 (Seven), and both 32-bit, and 64-bit versions.


Year / Date of Release: 2013
Version: v3.6.5 / v3.6.6
Developer: Softpointer Inc 1999 - 2013.Platforma:
Architecture: x32bit + x64 bit
